label: Vision & Mission
heading: Vision & Mission of the Department
description: To provide a conducive environment for developing socially responsible business professionals through experiential learning, research, and industry-linked academic orientation and to become the preferred choice among management aspirants.

sections.heading: Mission of the Department
items: To develop an environment of transformative experiential learning that builds business acumen among students.
To foster students' development, enabling them to contribute to organizational growth or become innovative entrepreneurs.
To create ethical, responsible professionals who add value to society and the environment.
